thread.section_title: McDonald’s Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McDonald’s | www.macdonalds.com
thread.title: Steve Joe Dearing
thread.title_full: McDonald’s reviewed by Steve Joe Dearing

author: Steve Joe Dearing
title: Steve Joe Dearing
text: Called to drive through and I was last car in queue. Was told system had failed and I have to come in store. Explained I was physically disabled and was told " Sorry there's nothing I can do about it ". Which is odd because if I were sat in grill order parking you would have to fetch it to me. I will never set foot in your establishment again.
